intro: Rally your Spartans and prove your skill on the battlefield.
description:
Command 8 unique Spartan heroes, build your ultimate army, and lead them into glorious battles to secure victory for your empire!

Plan your attack carefully and deploy your heroes with precision to crush the enemy forces. Each hero comes with special abilities you can train and upgrade, unlocking powerful new combat skills to overcome the toughest foes. 

Whether you're a seasoned tactician or a newcomer to the genre, you'll find plenty of depth and challenge to keep you coming back. 

Key Features: 
- Easy to pick up, but hard to master.
– Every battle requires careful planning and smart positioning. 
- Train and upgrade 8 different Spartan heroes, each with unique combat skills. 
- Defend your empire against relentless Persian invaders in epic, strategic battles. 
- Visuals and audio bring ancient warfare to life.
